---
title: "Kasmo Gacmeed Lexicon"
subtitle: "Kasmo bridges Somali and English to make AI concepts understandable and open to conversation. Learn more [here](about.qmd)."
format:
  html:
    toc: false
    page-layout: full
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        <meta property="og:title" content="Kasmo Gacmeed Lexicon">
        <meta property="og:description" content="An open collective lexicon for AI in Somali.">
        <meta property="og:image" content="https://kasmo.so/www/img/og-cover.png">
        <meta property="og:url" content="https://kasmo.so">
        <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
        <meta name="twitter:title" content="Kasmo Gacmeed Lexicon">
        <meta name="twitter:description" content="An open collective lexicon for AI in Somali.">
        <meta name="twitter:image" content="https://kasmo.so/www/img/og-cover.png">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="www/css/site.css">
        <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/d3@7"></script>
        <script defer src="www/js/graph.js"></script>
params:
  lang: "so"
---

<!-- Main content: pure graph -->
<div id="graph" class="graph-fill" aria-label="Interactive network"></div>

<!-- Inject our info panel into Quarto's left sidebar after the page loads -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  const shell = document.querySelector('#quarto-sidebar .sidebar-menu-container');
  if (!shell) return;

  shell.innerHTML = `
    <div id="kasmo-panel">
      <!-- TOP (sticky, never changes) -->
      <div id="kasmo-top" class="kasmo-top">
        <h5 class="mt-2">Select a term</h5>
        <p class="small text-muted mb-2">
          Click a node to see its definition and related terms.
        </p>
        <hr class="kasmo-sep" />

   <input id="kasmo-search" type="search" class="form-control form-control-sm mb-2"
               placeholder="Raadi / Search…" aria-label="Raadi / Search">
  <div class="d-flex gap-2 mb-1">
          <button id="kasmo-reset" class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">Reset</button>
          <button id="kasmo-lang"  class="btn btn-sm btn-outline-secondary">SO / EN</button>
    </div>
        <hr class="kasmo-sep" />
      </div>

  <!-- SCROLLABLE content (dynamic) -->
  <div id="kasmo-scroll" class="kasmo-scroll">

   <!-- Selected term title (dynamic) -->
  <h3 id="kasmo-selected-label" class="h5 mb-1"></h3>

  <hr class="kasmo-sep" />

<!-- Definition FIRST (empty until a node is selected) -->
  <div id="kasmo-def" class="small"></div>

   <hr class="kasmo-sep" />

  <!-- Related BELOW the definition -->
    <div id="kasmo-related-wrap">
     <h4 class="h6 mb-1">Related</h4>
     <div id="kasmo-related" class="small text-muted">—</div>
  </div>

  <hr class="kasmo-sep" />

  <!-- NEW TAGS META SECTION -->
 <div id="kasmo-tags-wrap">
          <h4 class="h6 mb-1">Tags</h4>
          <div id="kasmo-tags" class="small text-muted">—</div>
    </div>

   </div>
 </div>
  `;

  // Expose to graph.js (IDs must match what graph.js expects)
  window.KASMO_SIDEBAR = {
    selectedLabel: document.getElementById('kasmo-selected-label'),
    def:     document.getElementById('kasmo-def'),
    related: document.getElementById('kasmo-related'),
    tags:    document.getElementById('kasmo-tags'),
    search:  document.getElementById('kasmo-search'),
    reset:   document.getElementById('kasmo-reset'),
    lang:    document.getElementById('kasmo-lang'),
  };
});
</script>

<!-- Pass initial language to JS -->
<script>
  window.KASMO_PARAMS = { lang: "{{ params.lang }}" };
</script>
